reviewText: excellent quality. It was great to finally see some negima in HD. the cover art on the front of the box is a bit bland; the back of the box is better though. no subtitles or english dub obviously so keep that in mind. the blu rays are region free which is a huge plus.
Works like a charm, which I didn't expect considering its a japanese blu ray, but hey it works on my PS3 so I'm happy. Thanks.
